settings.title: Zipato Device Settings
settings.description: On this page you see the settings for the Zipato devices.

descriptions.clearTags: Please use the below settings only when you are really sure you want to reset the settings of the tags in Homey (and therefore in most cases need to rebuild your flows and reset your Tag Readers as well).
descriptions.allowTags: Registration of new tags is allowed
descriptions.denyTags: Registration of new tags is not allowed

messages.confirmClearEventLog: Are you sure you want to clear the entire event log?
messages.confirmClearTags: Clear all tags from the Homey cache. Please note that you should reset all your devices to factory settings and start adding the tags and codes again. Are you sure?
messages.tagsClearedConfirmation: The tags are all removed from Homey. Please reset your Tag Readers manually.
messages.userDeleted: User deleted, click on save user settings to commit the delete
messages.noEventsYet: No events yet available, add a Tag Reader to your Homey to start collecting events.

messages.noUsersYet: No users known in Homey yet, add a user via the add button.
messages.confirmDeteleUser: Are you sure you want to remove this user?

messages.noDevicesYet: No reports reported to Homey yet, couldn't determine devices and their reporting status.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Please use the below settings only when you are really sure you want to reset the settings of Homey (and therefore in most cases need to rebuild your flows and reset your Tag Readers as well).

condition.userNotFound: Can't find user with given ID.
condition.unknownUserStatus: The status of the user is unknown. Please toggle the user status first before using this condition card.
